item.title: Guaranteed Your Beauty
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Pretty Little Things NEW COLLECTION Introducing our latest collection A Litte Things. Inspired by contemporary sculpture, the new 22 piece collection features curved lines, chunky chains, and flowing shapes. Simple, elevated classics handcrafted in 100% recycled silver and the highest quality 18ct gold-plate designed to be layered or stand alone.
item.content:encoded:
Pretty Little Things

NEW COLLECTION

Introducing our latest collection A Litte Things. Inspired by contemporary sculpture, the new 22 piece collection features curved lines, chunky chains, and flowing shapes. Simple, elevated classics handcrafted in 100% recycled silver and the highest quality 18ct gold-plate designed to be layered or stand alone.
